text: Ne uverovali te, kotoryye skazali: «Voistinu, Allakh - eto Messiya, syn Mar'yam (Marii)». Skazhi: «Kto mozhet khotya by nemnogo pomeshat' Allakhu, yesli On pozhelayet pogubit' Messiyu, syna Mar'yam (Marii), yego mat' i vsekh, kto na zemle?». Allakhu prinadlezhit vlast' nad nebesami, zemley i tem, chto mezhdu nimi. On sozdayet, chto pozhelayet. Allakh sposoben na vsyakuyu veshch'
